trans-unit.source: Represents the security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref>.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> class is designed for interoperation with services that implement WS-* specifications.
The transport security for this binding is Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) over HTTP, or HTTPS.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
Gets the message-level security settings for this binding.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NonDualMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> instance.

The default value includes: <xref:System.ServiceModel.NonDualMessageSecurityOverHttp.EstablishSecurityContext*> with default set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.ClientCredentialType*> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.AlgorithmSuite*> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256*>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Specifies the message <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> for this binding.

This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> and/or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property buckets may or may not become effective.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> for this binding.
The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>.
The value of the Mode set is not defined.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
This is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for XAML integration.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
This is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for XAML integration.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an object that contains the transport-level security settings for this binding.
You can use the object returned by this property to set the transport security settings for the binding.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> for this binding.

The default value includes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType*> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType> and a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType*> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"></xref>.
